titleStmt.title: A godly exhortation to this distressed nation Shewing the true cause of this unnaturall civill war amongst us.
titleStmt.author: Crouch, Humphrey, fl. 1635-1671.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "VVhen pride aboundeth in the City,".
At head of text: Psal. L. Verst XV. Call upon me in the time of trouble, so will I heare thee, and thou shalt praise me.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
